About.About3:
I am currently focused on being part of an IT company, in function of my background, I`ve oriented my profile towards Agile Methodologies, with the role of Product Owner being the gateway followed by Digital Mkt and CM.
On the other hands I have taken several complementary courses to complete the Front-End developer training(Web developer, JavaScripts and React) and the Google Support Specialist Program by coursera.
Regarding my personality I consider myself worthy of all trust where values such as honesty and commitment represent me. I am the owner of an extroverted, empathic, competitive profile with a strong customer-oriented vocation. If my profile aroused your interest do not hesitate to contact me
